question: when u facing problems what has holy prophet(peace be upon on him) told to how to come out of problem (sunnat method)

A person in such a state may see to many things:

1. Rectify any wrong actions being committed by him/herself (which is the cause of all difficulties, predicaments in one?s life), b) Tawbah (repentance), Istighaar (seeking forgiveness) for one?s past sins

2. Salaatul Haajat ? prayer of needs, where one should offer 2 Rakats Nafl Salaat on a regular basis in order for Allah to fulfil one?s needs

3. Du?aa: should be made constantly to Allah to remove one?s problems

4. Tawajjuh: Focus one?s attention to Allah who is the only doer of everything

5. Sadaqah: Charity cools the anger of Allah. (Hadith)

6. Tafweez: remind oneself that all happenings occur with the will and command of Allah, hence, all the means should be used and handed over to Allah Ta?ala to remove the problems.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
